item.title: TypeScript Notes
item.author: Tianyao (Till) Chen
item.description: Basics ES6 OOP Debugging Basics tsc -init generates tsconfig.json and now tsc will compile all the files in the directory and subdirectories. Arrays. 1 2 const pets: string[] = ['cats', 'dogs'] // can only hold strings now. const weirdArray: any[] = ['cats', 42] // can hold any type. Tuples are just arrays with a specific number of elements of specific types. There are no enforcements in JS, but it’s all enforced in TS.
